data.title: Compton Unified School District
data.text:
We want the entire community to know how well our students are doing in Compton and to share in our excitement about where we are going as a district. We are elevating in every way and our students are proof of that. We believe that every child can achieve greatness and success - right here in Compton.

CUSD Nondiscrimination Statement

The Compton Unified School District prohibits discrimination, intimidation, harassment (Including sexual harassment) or bullying based on a personâ€™s actual or perceived ancestry, color, disability, gender identity, gender expression, immigration status, nationality, race or ethnicity, religion, sex, sexual orientation, or association with a person or group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics.
